name: Lucky Drop
description: Gift crypto or NFTs to any users, first come, first served.
nft_approve_all_tip: Note: When selecting approve all, all NFTs in the contract will be authorized for sale by default, including the NFTs transfered later.

hint: You can withdraw the remaining balance 24 hours after the Lucky Drop is sent.
